spark/port.description: Port of the REST endpoint for submitting Spark jobs.

spark/webui-port.description: Port of the Web UI for showing job progress and results.

spark/host.description: The host that the Spark cluster dispatcher will register under.

spark/mesos-master.description: URL to the Mesos master that Spark jobs will be communicating to. (i.e: mesos://mesos-host.com:5050)

spark/zookeeper.description: URL to the Zookeeper that Spark cluster framework connects to persist state to. (l.e: zk://0.0.0.0:2181)
